TopicTitle: Starting a new game with the career halway completed?

Articles.Content:
Hi Forum,

my game seems to have broken - I can no longer load any savegames from my current save, the game always gets stuck on "creating vessel".

So it looks like I need to start a new campaign. I'd like to continue the campaign where I last left it, which is  doing the Jool missions. I know I can use the cheats menu to get the science, but is there also a way to skip through the career missions, so that I don't need to redo all of them?

 

Thanks in advance for any advice!

Hi, if none of your saved games load I guess the problem is an corrupted ship in VAB, go to 
C:\Users\(username)\AppData\LocalLow\Intercept Games\Kerbal Space Program 2\

It should be an folder with the name of your space agency and under there an sub folder vab or something. Try to move all the files here out and see if game loads now.
